Properties.Name: ObsoleteReason
Properties.Value: Discontinued because of performance refactoring. Use the field Posting Date OnLastML instead.

Arguments.Value: Use GetAzureMLCredentials(LPMachineLearningSetup: Record "LP Machine Learning Setup"; var ApiUri: Text[250]; var ApiKey: SecretText): Boolean instead

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies whether to use the Late Payment Prediction extension to predict if an invoice will be paid on time.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the predictive model to use. This can be the standard model that we provide, or your own custom model if you have created one by using the Create My Model action.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the minimum model quality you require. The value is a percentage between zero and one, and indicates how accurate predictions will be. Typically, this field is useful when you create a custom model. If the quality of a model is below this threshold, it will not be used.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the quality value for the model you are using. For custom models, the predictive experiment determines this value when training the model. The value is a percentage between zero and one, and indicates how accurate predictions will be.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the number of seconds of compute time that you have not yet used.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the number of seconds of compute time that was originally available for the standard model, or the model for your custom experiment.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the date on which you last used Azure compute time.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies that you use a model that you created, rather than the standard model that we provide. To use your model, you must provide your API URI and API Key. You must also choose My Model in the Selected Model field in the Late Payment Prediction Setup window.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies that you use your own Azure Machine Learning subscription, rather than the subscription you get through Business Central. For example, this is useful when you need more computing time. To use your subscription, provide your API URI and API key. You must also choose My Model in the Selected Model field on the Late Payment Prediction Setup page.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the API key to connect to the Azure Machine Learning service

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Send your data to our predictive experiment and we will prepare a predictive model for you. To use your predictive model, choose My Model in the Selected Model field.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Send your data to our predictive experiment and we will test the selected predictive model for you.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Define when payment predictions are updated by setting up the related job queue entry in the Job Queue Entry Card window.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Update the late payment predictions for all invoices. Predictions are available only if the Late Payment Prediction extension is enabled.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Visualize the model and display it.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Explore models for Azure Machine Learning, and use Azure Machine Learning Studio to build, test, and deploy the Prediction Model for Microsoft Dynamics 365.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies that the payment for this invoice is predicted to be late.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the reliability of the late payment prediction. High is above 90%, Medium is between 80% and 90%, and Low is less than 80%.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the percentage that the prediction confidence value is based on.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Manage settings for the Late Payment Prediction extension.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies sales invoices that are predicted to be paid late.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies that the payment for this invoice is predicted to be late.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the reliability of the late payment prediction. High is above 90%, Medium is between 80% and 90%, and Low is less than 80%.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the percentage that the prediction confidence value is based on.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Update the late payment predictions for all invoices. Predictions are available only if the Late Payment Prediction extension is enabled.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Predict whether the payment for this sales document will be made on time. Predictions are available only if the Late Payment Prediction extension is enabled.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Predict whether the payment for this sales document will be made on time. Predictions are available only if the Late Payment Prediction extension is enabled.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Predict whether the payment for this sales document will be made on time. Predictions are available only if the Late Payment Prediction extension is enabled.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the document number of the open invoice.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the name of the customer.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the remaining amount to be paid for this invoice.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the due date of the invoice.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies whether this invoice will be paid on time. Configure in the Late Payment Prediction Setup page how this field is computed.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the confidence level of the payment prediction.
